type.description:
## Equal

---


[Bi-entity Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/bientity_condition_types/equal)

Checks if the actor entity is the target entity.

Type ID: `origins:equal`

---

###	Examples

```json
"bientity_condition": {
	"type": "origins:equal"
}
```
